main_definition: Household refers to the people living in a particular dwelling, their activities related to managing home affairs or an entire family unit, as well as items commonly used and stored within a residence.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of people who live together under one roof
meanings_and_examples.example: The Smiths are a typical household with two children.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Activities related to the management and maintenance of home affairs
meanings_and_examples.example: Household chores like cleaning, cooking, and laundry fall under housekeeping duties.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Items commonly used and stored within a residence
meanings_and_examples.example: A household typically includes items such as furniture, appliances, tools, and decorations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An entire family unit or clan living together in one dwelling
meanings_and_examples.example: The extended Johnson household consists of grandparents, parents, children, and sometimes even cousins living under the same roof.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group of people who share a common domestic space for social or economic purposes
meanings_and_examples.example: A boarding house is a type of household where individuals from different families live together in shared rooms and communal areas, often paying rent to the owner.
